text: Julia Nesheiwat is an American national security adviser. She was the 10th homeland security advisor in the first Donald Trump administration from 2020 to 2021. She also worked for George W. Bush and Barack Obama during their presidencies. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Politicians from New York (state) Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Florida
title: Julia Nesheiwat
